==== Create a new Author Page ====
* Go to [[Authors.WebHome]] and click "Create" * Choose the PAuthor Template * Use the person's name for the title * Click "Create" * You should now be looking at your new page. Dont worry that it doesnt look right yet.
==== Add Objects to your page ====
* You are now going to add a single PAuthorClass object to your page: * Under the Edit menu, choose "Objects".
===== Add a "PAuthor Class" object =====
* In the "new object:" field, choose "PAuthor Class" and click "Add". * Now fill in the fields with information about the author: ** name: the person's name ** imageURL: the URL of an image of the person (find an image of the person, try wikipedia first, point to the image, right click, choose "Copy Image Location", and then paste) ** wikipedia URL: the URL of the person's wikipedia page. If none, leave blank ** description: a neutral description of the person (e.g. "Host of a Fox News TV show") ** facebook URL: the URL of the person's facebook page. If none, leave blank. ** occupation: ** employer: * Press "Save". Open this page in another tab to view it, so you don't have to keep going in and out of "edit mode". Every time you press "Save", go to the other tab and refresh the page. * At this point, verify that the full page looks correct.
